date: 2014-01-01

**Duration:** 2014-2017  
**Funding:** European Space Agency (ESA) Contract No. 4000107143/12/NL/FF/If  
**Role:** Subcontractor (CO₂ fluxes)

Technical assistance for the deployment of an advanced hyperspectral imaging sensor during the FLEX-EU project, with responsibility for chamber measurements of CO₂ fluxes in various ecosystems.
